channel.title: Need coder+hoster
channel.description:
Starting server: Ruin-Scape
Server base...SWATSCAPE.
Latest update: New client that has the same interfaces as real runescape. You will see once you login!
(If you can host and code, you can have owner!)
If you can only do 1, you get mod.
I am looking for an experienced coder to help me make my server as much like RS as possible.
PM me back.
~Thanks.

item.title: Need coder+hoster
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Why don’t you make a list of exactly what you want, and get started. Then, if you get problems as you work, you can always ask for help.

Read full topic

item.title: Need coder+hoster
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

I never asked for a perfect computer. I am trying to create a nice one. Now, since I am still sorta new to Java, I need a helping hand. And read my post before this 1.

item.title: Need coder+hoster

item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

item.title: Need coder+hoster
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

Dude, stfu. I don’t need or want your help. I am kinda sick of you really.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2007, 09:45:42 AM[/size][hr][quote=“X-J-K-X, post:2, topic:159921”][quote]
I am looking for an experienced coder to help me make my server as much like RS as possible.
[/quote]

Lul gl, no1 is gonna code it that close to rs just for you. -.-… DIY?[/quote]Do you have a messenger? I will show you a couple of pics of my server so far. It’s pretty neat. And also, I will give you admin on it, if you’re nice…=-).

Read full topic
